mapper.sql: id, roleCode, resourceCode, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier, status
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_role_resources ( roleCode, resourceCode, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier, status ) VALUES ( #{roleCode}, #{resourceCode}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{status} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_role_resources
roleCode = #{roleCode},
resourceCode = #{resourceCode},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_role_resources
roleCode = #{map.roleCode},
resourceCode = #{map.resourceCode},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_role_resources ( roleCode, resourceCode, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier, status ) VALUES ( #{map.roleCode}, #{map.resourceCode}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.status} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_role_resources
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND roleCode like CONCAT('%', #{roleCode} , '%')
AND resourceCode like CONCAT('%', #{resourceCode} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
